EmailTemplate.name: Dance Classes Oct'12
EmailTemplate.subject: Dance Classes: Sunday, 14th October.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The British School of Guangzhou Part of The British Schools Group
Dear Parents,
Please be reminded BSG's School of Dance will start this weekend.
Please click here for further information.
Registration will take place from 12-1pm on Sunday, 14th October.
If you would like more information, please contact Miss Kate Stephenson (kate.stephenson@bsg.org.cn).
Kind regards,
P.E. Department The British School of Guangzhou World Class Education
_________________________________________________________ Member of The British Schools Group- University of Cambridge Examination Centre - Member of The Federation of British International School of South East Asia - Member of the Conference of British International Schools - Licensed by the Chinese Ministry of Education
